quotes: Per your request, I have completed the review of change-of-control provisions across all 14 executive employment agreements.
Current provisions: all executives receive double-trigger acceleration (termination + change of control). I recommend aligning with current market practice.
Proposed revision for C-Suite (CEO, CFO, CTO, GC, VP People): single-trigger acceleration of 100% of unvested equity upon a qualifying change-of-control event.
VP-level executives: double-trigger acceleration with a 12-month post-closing continued employment requirement. This aligns with the 2024 Compensia survey data.

Current change-of-control definition: acquisition of 50%+ of voting shares or substantially all assets
Proposed severance for C-suite: 24 months base salary + target bonus
Proposed severance for VP-level: 12 months base salary
Benchmarking source: Compensia 2024 Executive Compensation Survey
Estimated equity value subject to acceleration at current 409A: $42M across all executives

quotes: We're excited to announce a new Retention Bonus Program designed to reward our most critical team members for their commitment to Nextera.
